00034 /** @file builtins.h
00035     @brief Declarations of functions related to builtins and the 
00036            standard library
00037 */
00038 
00039 #ifndef ISPC_STDLIB_H
00040 #define ISPC_STDLIB_H 1
00041 
00042 #include "ispc.h"
00043 
00044 /** Adds declarations and definitions of ispc standard library functions
00045     and types to the given module.
00046 
00047     @param symbolTable     SymbolTable in which to add symbol definitions for
00048                            stdlib stuff
00049     @param ctx             llvm::LLVMContext to use for getting types and the
00050                            like for standard library definitions
00051     @param module          Module in which to add the declarations/definitions
00052     @param includeStdlib   Indicates whether the definitions from the stdlib.ispc
00053                            file should be added to the module.
00054  */
00055 void DefineStdlib(SymbolTable *symbolTable, llvm::LLVMContext *ctx, llvm::Module *module,
00056                   bool includeStdlib);
00057 
00058 #endif // ISPC_STDLIB_H
